page.title: 20STUDYING RADSTOCK
page.content: The information for D Block 03680153 was gathered together by children from St.Nicholas'Junior School,Radstock.The children worked in four groups which were as follows; {WILLIAM GROUP Heidi Dallimore,Lisa Hinge,Lisa Young, Christian Barnard,Lee Paget,John Purvey,Steven Young. {CONQUEROR GROUP} Sarah Bailey,Jessica Davis,Sarah Holmes,Adam Brown,Richard Flower,Kevin Griffin,Simon Munro. {NORMAN GROUP} Kirsty Butt,Vanessa Harrison,Anita Seymour,Wayne Griffiths,Janson Higgins Jason Wilson. {DOMESDAY GROUP Helen Malkin,Kay Moore,Tina Stevens, Steven Bigden,Matthew Coombes,Michael Robson,Jonathon Tiley.
